pages.text: As you've probably realised, Vampires don't eat regular food. Instead, they live on a blood-based diet. Blood is the source of a vampire's power, and without it, they can't reach their full potential.

pages.title: Increased Capacity
pages.text: As a vampire, you can hold more food than a regular human. Your maximum blood capacity is 40 points (20 full icons), which allows you to use your abilities more frequently and effectively.
